scripts.bundle: mkdir -p build &> /dev/null && browserify --node --standalone _ --external process --ignore-missing index.js -o build/output1.js && ./tools/minify_if_changed.sh build/output1.js build/soundhole_js_bundle.js
scripts.bundle-quick: mkdir -p build &> /dev/null && browserify --node --standalone _ --external process --ignore-missing index.js -o build/soundhole_js_bundle.js
scripts.make-header: npm run bundle && cd build && xxd -i soundhole_js_bundle.js > soundhole_js_bundle.h
scripts.make-header-quick: npm run bundle-quick && cd build && xxd -i soundhole_js_bundle.js > soundhole_js_bundle.h
